resources.string: The application needs to obtain write permission to the external storage to store the image in preparation for sharing it through other applications
The operation was not executed because the necessary permissions to perform it were not granted

string-array.name: answer_description
string-array.item: It is placed over the station or ghutra to fix it
مبطنة بالصوف، تلبس في الشتاء للوقاية من البرد
Fleece lined, worn in winter to prevent cold
It is used to dye hair and beard, and it is also used to beautify hands for women
The bowl used for serving coffee among Arabs
Made of leather, worn on the foot, it was famous in the old days of the Arabs
Small white weapon placed on the waist
The name of the instrument that was used for lighting in the past
A tool used for lighting and decoration
A red hat was popular in the Levant, Egypt and Morocco
An Arab dress that is widely worn in the Gulf countriesgit branch
